author: gpetruc
body:
Add hit-level dE/dx information to miniAOD for selected tracks:
 * high pT tracks for EXO studies: p<sub>T</sub> > 50 GeV, loose dxy, dz cuts, loose isolation (no isolation for p<sub>T</sub> > 200 GeV)
 * disappearing tracks for SUSY: p<sub>T</sub> > 15 GeV (10 GeV for pixel-only tracks), tight dxy, dz cuts, lepton veto, isolation cut.

Expected number of selected tracks per event on some MC and data files:

PD | EXO | SUSY | TOTAL
-- | -- | -- | --
Data_SingleMuon | 0.18 | 0.06 | 0.23
Data_SingleElectron | 0.23 | 0.09 | 0.31
Data_MET | 0.06 | 0.04 | 0.09
Data_JetHT | 0.21 | 0.10 | 0.28
MC_DYJets | 0.11 | 0.10 | 0.20
MC_TT | 0.27 | 0.15 | 0.41
MC_WJets | 0.04 | 0.04 | 0.08
MC_QCD | 0.18 | 0.06 | 0.21

 Data is run 299649 ( ~ 1.6E34 lumi )

@mmasciov @arizzi @jozzez1 @bjmarsh
title: dE/dx updates in miniAOD
